original_text: The teachers of the law and the chief priests looked for a way to arrest him immediately, because they knew he had spoken this parable against them. But they were afraid of the people.
korean_text: 서기관들과 대제사장들이 예수의 이 비유는 자기들을 가리켜 말씀하심인 줄 알고 즉시 잡고자 하되 백성을 두려워하더라

sentences.original_text: The teachers of the law and the chief priests
looked for a way to arrest him immediately
he had spoken this parable against them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 향해 이 비유를 말했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: But they were afraid of the people
